data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of KSH International Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from December 23 2025 the Equity Shares of KSH International Ltd (Scrip Code: 544664) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251222-  dated December 22 2025.
